name: Cheesy Cracker Bread Pizza
author: Borden® Cheese
summary: Crispy cracker bread rounds topped with shredded cheese, crisp crumbled bacon, tomatoes, red onion, and fresh parsley make easy and delicious pizzas.
ingredients: 1  (12 inch) piece cracker bread or flatbread
1 tablespoon olive oil, plus extra for brushing
1 (8 ounce) package Borden® Cheese Mild Cheddar Shreds
8  strips thick-cut bacon, cooked crisp and broken into 1-inch pieces
½  red onion, cut into strips
¼ cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
directions: Brush the cracker bread with a small amount of olive oil and place on cookie sheet
Spread 11/2 cups Borden® Cheese Mild Cheddar Shreds evenly around the cracker bread
Top evenly with bacon pieces pizza
olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat until hot
Add the sliced garlic cloves and sauté until slightly browned
Arrange sliced tomatoes and red onions around the pizza
Add parsley to the remaining ½ cup cheese and spread over other ingredients
Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted
Cut into squares and serve immediately
Garnish with fresh basil leaves, if desired
